job.title: General Manager Task Force
job.description: <p><strong><em>The Hampton Inn, Wilmington/Christina, 1008 Old Churchman’s Road, Newark, DE is ready for you to join us as a Task Force General Manager.&nbsp;(With the ability to apply for the Full Time General Manager position)</em></strong></p><p><strong><em>If you have a passion for hospitality and want to be a part of TBC Hotels, a progressive, exciting hotel company, we think it would be incredible to hear from you… Are you currently an Assistant General Manager, an Operations Manager, or perhaps a Hotel General Manager looking to make a move?&nbsp;&nbsp;Do not let this Task Force opportunity pass you by.&nbsp;&nbsp;</em></strong></p><p>The Hampton Inn is looking to add an exceptional leader to our team.&nbsp;We are looking for a very “<strong><em>hands on</em></strong>” Task Force General Manager, to bring their talents to our hotel.&nbsp;Is this you?&nbsp;At least one year of hotel operational experience is required.&nbsp;If you have knowledge of OnQ, or Hilton experience, it is a major plus. It goes without saying that you must be dependable, ability to work a flexible schedule, and bring your smile and positive vibes with you every day!&nbsp;We are going to be picky as we are looking for the right puzzle piece to add to our family.&nbsp;If you are trying to find a new opportunity where everyone brings next level hospitality, please apply!</p>
